hymn.title: Whenever the heart shall turn to the Lord

layout.singingstanza: When -- ev -- er the heart shall turn to the Lord, The veil shall be tak -- en a -- way. So turn your heart to the Lord all the day, And the veil shall be tak -- en a -- way. Now the Lord is that Spir -- it, And where the Spir -- it of the Lord is, There is li -- ber -- ty— such li -- ber -- ty! When -- ev -- er the heart shall turn to the Lord, The veil shall be tak -- en a -- way.

lyrics.stanza: Whenever the heart shall turn to the Lord, The veil shall be taken away. So turn your heart to the Lord all the day, And the veil shall be taken away. Now the Lord is that Spirit, And where the Spirit of the Lord is, There is liberty—such liberty! Whenever the heart shall turn to the Lord, The veil shall be taken away.
